description:
This file appears to be a Python source script for generating code related to JSON-RPC event and method registration. It includes functions to emit code for RPC prototypes, registration, and deregistration, as well as event handling, primarily for a C++ project

It seems to be part of a larger code generation system for RPC interfaces in a plugin-based architecture.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates code for emitting a JSON-RPC event handler function with parameters formatted for C++ code, handling various parameter types and serialization logic.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Emits the header and namespace setup code for the generated RPC source file, including includes, namespace declarations, and versioning.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Emits namespace closing code after RPC code generation.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits C++ namespace with version constants for RPC.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function to emit the full RPC registration, unregistration, and event handling code, including handling method signatures and event registration.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Coordinates the emission of the complete RPC code including prologue, main body, and epilogue by calling internal functions.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Emits version information and wraps the RPC code emission.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
